name: VR Star Racer 3D for Google Cardboard
name_original: VR Star Racer 3D for Google Cardboard
description:
Press the Cardboard Trigger or look "START" button to start the game! Tilt your head in the direction you want to move the spaceship, get blue rings for more score!

This game is for Google Cardboard and other 3D mobile virtual reality headsets.

Learn more about Google Cardboard here:
https://www.google.com/get/cardboard/

Suitable for children and all ages.

Have fun !
